name: The state of Private Voting - Report
description:
What is the latest on private voting, on Ethereum and Beyond. A walkthrough of the protocols that exist, their attributes, and their maturity. This report is being compiled for MolochDAO.

Takeaways:
- What are the latest protocols for privacy voting
- What are their tradeoffs/characteristics (e.g what is private, how mature they are)
- How can users hit the ground running to integrate them for apps

speakers.name: Odysseas.eth
speakers.bio: Protocol Engineer passionate about cross-chain and privacy.
